author: VinInn
body:
Factorize CCC value into a single cfi file
Factories the reading of this PSet into a single header file
use consistently.

No regression expected, no regression observed. HLT expected to fail.
@mtosi @perrotta please check/act/instruct

affected producers

SiStripClusterizer, SiStripClusterizerFromRaw (actually their Algorithm''s PSet)
SeedingLayersEDProducer (actually its embedded strip PSets)
Chi2ChargeMeasurementEstimatorESProducer
ClusterChargeMasker
ClusterShapeHitFilterESProducer

in all cases the optional attribute
"minGoodStripCharge"/"minGoodCharge"
has been substituted with a MANDATORY

```
clusterChargeCut = cms.PSet(refToPSet_ = cms.string('SiStripClusterChargeCutXXX'))
```

with XXX = None/Loose/Tight
corresponding to current CCC values of 0/1724/2069

Lesson Learned:
use of ParameterSet::existsAs is nothing less that introducing a time bomb that will at some point induce subtle regressions such as massive HLT/ALCA silent failures...

manually ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #7673
title: port CCCPSet to 75X
